timeline.title: Humble Beginnings
timeline.description: Started as a small group of 12 families meeting in a living room, sharing meals and studying scripture together.

timeline.title: First Building
timeline.description: Moved into our first church building, welcoming 150 members and launching our first children's ministry.

timeline.title: Community Outreach
timeline.description: Launched our first community outreach programs, including food banks and youth mentorship initiatives.

timeline.title: Multiple Campuses
timeline.description: Expanded to serve multiple locations across the city, reaching over 1,000 families in our community.

timeline.title: Digital Innovation
timeline.description: Adapted to serve our community online, reaching families worldwide and launching virtual small groups.

timeline.title: Growing Together 1
timeline.description: Continuing to grow as a family of faith, serving our city and making a difference in thousands of lives.

timeline.title: Growing Together 2
timeline.description: Continuing to grow as a family of faith, serving our city and making a difference in thousands of lives.

timeline.title: Growing Together 3
timeline.description: Continuing to grow as a family of faith, serving our city and making a difference in thousands of lives.
